nodes.text: The Bloodskull was a pirate airship owned by Ramchak who was operating in conjunction with Aveca Dunn.

In 3 BBY, the pirates on the Bloodskull attacked the Dooku airship Windrunner with the intention of capturing Bron Dooku. The pirates then boarded the Windrunner using cables, engaging the airship's security force while Vex snuck aboard to snatch Bron. Imperial agent Jahan Cross pursued Vex to the Bloodskull and commandeered one of the turbolasers mounted to the deck. He then used the weapon to blow a hole in the hull, critically damaging the ship.
